downloadTitle: Microsoft Application Transporter 2006 for Lotus Domino Demo: Workflow Application Migration and Comparison
downloadDescription: This Flash demo shows a migration of Lotus Domino workflow application data using the Microsoft Application Transporter 2006 for Lotus Domino, and how Microsoft SharePoint Products and Technologies and Microsoft Office InfoPath can be used to provide the same workflow functionality.
detailsSection: This Flash demo shows a typical Lotus Domino workflow application and how SharePoint and InfoPath can be used to provide the same functionality. The demo also walks through a migration of the application data using the Microsoft Application Transporter 2006 for Lotus Domino, and compares the ease of creating a workflow enabled process using Microsoft Office SharePoint Designer.
systemRequirementsSection:
• This download relates with the following Office program:
    • 2007 Microsoft Office system
installInstructionSection:
To install this download:

  1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download.
  2. Double-click LotusNotesAppMigrationDemo.msi to start the installation.
  3. Follow the instructions on the installation wizard to complete the installation.
Instructions for use:

  • To launch this demo, click the Start menu, point to All Programs, point to Microsoft Office System Demos, point to this demo, and then click Launch Demo.

To remove this download:

  • On the Start menu, point to All Programs, point to Microsoft Office System Demos, point to this demo, and then click Uninstall Demo.
